oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Black Wool Dress
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Textiles--History; Clothing and dress;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black wool dress with dolman sleeves. Features fur trim on the sleeve cuffs.
